question.data: Vitamin B1 (thiamine) is one of the most important members of the B group of vitamins. Also known as aneurin, this vitamin helps prevent neuritic and beriberi.

question.q: Galena is an ore of which metal ?
question.data: Galena, also called lead glance, is the natural mineral form of lead(II) sulfide. It is the most important ore of lead and an important source of silver. Galena is one of the most abundant and widely distributed sulfide minerals.
